name: Project Walking Sim (Read Description)
description:
Just a showcase of stuff picked up from Godot

Hold the right arrow key to move.

Todd Howlett - UP2120169- Game shown above - coding and post

Jess Luck - UP2159973 Art shown in Drive below

This game is a very early twist on a game concept we made, a shareable drive link will be added below to show Jessica's art work for later versions of the game.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/1bQD-Bn4oT0jY3MImR6sJCZVp8TgtPxwe/view?usp=shari... ( Jess' Artwork)

(Due to last minute development issues i had to quickly build up this short game to show off my experience with the GODOT engine without sadly having time to produce models for it, everything show is in engine)
